===================================================

Classic 80's Heavy Metal album.  Relentless guitar assalut from Ia and Pete Toomey.  Fast screaming guitar solo's that will make the hairs on the back of your neck stand on end...

Bitches Sin's unique brand of Metal has influenced the development of the Metal scene since the 80's, with it's music receiving wide acclaim from all over the world.  Bitches Sin has a huge international following in the underground scene which continues today.

This cult heavy metal band, based in the north of England, were formed in April 1980. After several changes, the definitive line-up of Ian Toomey, Pete Toomey, Frank Quegan, Billy Knowles and Mike Frazer, came together and produced some of the most influential Heavy Metal music of the 80's with their first album charting in the Sounds and Melody Maker Top 30 back in 1982. This culminated in the cult classic, 'Invaders' album, released in 1986, which received rave reviews from Aardshock's Readers Poll, amongst many, many others.  For more info visit:

www.bitchessin.co.uk

====================================================
